pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, July 12, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Edmonton, Alberta

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister and Minister of Natural Resources Amarjeet Sohi will meet with workers. A media availability will follow.

Trans Mountain Edmonton Terminal 
1680 101A Avenue

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to register to attend by 7:00 a.m. on Friday, July 12th by emailing media@transmountain.com.
  • Media are asked to present themselves to the main security gate at 1680 101A Avenue no later than 8:15 a.m.
